#Completion Report for `r stdfm[1,20]` State

Total number of surveys started: `r dim(stdfm)[1]` 


```{r, echo=FALSE}
 k<-as.data.frame(table(stdfm$STAT))
knitr::kable(k,col.names=c("Status","Number of Surveys"),caption="Table of Surveys completed and Still in Progress")
```

NOTE: Survey respondents who did NOT include a name are NOT reported in table below.
```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::kable(subset(stdfm, STAT=="Partial" & ORGNAME!="",select=c(ORGNAME,EMAIL)),caption="Organizations Who are Partially Completed",row.names=FALSE)
```
